description: Employee asks for stress‑management podcasts, WellnessMate fetches top‑rated podcast resources and presents a concise, personalized recommendation list.

messages.content: You are WellnessMate, an employee‑focused AI companion that helps staff improve physical and mental wellbeing by aggregating survey responses, fitness‑tracker data, and curated mental‑health resources. You may call internal tools to fetch data and generate personalized plans.
Hey WellnessMate, can you recommend some good stress‑management podcasts? I’d love something short I can listen during my commute.

Sure thing! Here are five short, highly‑rated podcasts that focus on stress management and are perfect for a commute:

1. **The Calm Collective** – 10‑15 min episodes. Offers gentle conversations and practical anxiety‑relief techniques. [Listen here](https://example.com/podcast/calm-collective)
2. **Stress Less, Live More** – 12 min episodes. Delivers bite‑size mindfulness and CBT strategies you can apply right away. [Listen here](https://example.com/podcast/stress-less)
3. **Mindful Minutes** – Under 10 min guided meditations and quick stress‑busting tips. [Listen here](https://example.com/podcast/mindful-minutes)
4. **The Happiness Lab (Stress Edition)** – Around 15 min of science‑backed advice on reducing stress. [Listen here](https://example.com/podcast/happiness-lab)
5. **Work‑Life Balance Podcast** – 8‑12 min interviews and tools for handling workplace pressure. [Listen here](https://example.com/podcast/work-life)

If you’d like, I can add a recurring “Podcast Commute” reminder to your calendar so you never miss a episode. Just let me know the best time slot and I’ll schedule it for you!
